title: Zaineb Smida
text:
Associate professor (Maître de conférences) at INSA Lyon, France, since September 2023, and a member of the PSPM team at Institut Camille Jordan. I defended my Ph.D under the supervision of Ali Gannoun and Lionel Cucala at [University of Montpellier](https://www.umontpellier.fr/) in November 2021.



Functional Data Analysis
Scan Statistics (Cluster Detection)
Statistical Testing
Spatial Statistics
Asymptotic Theory

title: Research
text:
Z. Smida, L. Cucala, A. Gannoun, G. Durif (2021). A Wilcoxon-Mann-Whitney spatial scan statistic for functional data. Computational Statistics and Data Analysis.
Z. Smida, L. Cucala, A. Gannoun, G. Durif (2022). A median test for functional data. Journal of Nonparametric Statistics.
C. Frévent, A. Mohamed-Salem, J. Soula, Z. Smida, L. Cucala, S. Dabo-Niang, M. Genin (2023). The R Package HDSpatialScan for the Detection of Clusters of Multivariate and Functional Data using Spatial Scan Statistics. The R Journal.
Z. Smida, G. Durif, L. Cucala (2023). The R package funStatTest : Statistical Testing for Functional Data.

title: Research
text:
On Going works
Z. Smida, M. Berrada, C. Thomas-Agnan (2023+). Comparing mass concentrations of two marked point processes. Applications to veterinary shortage.
A. Archimbaud, Z. Smida, A. Ruiz-Gazen (2023+). A multivariate test of unimodality.
